titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the special deduction for the living expenses of Members of Congress.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/18/1997--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code, with respect to the deduction of trade or business expenses, to repeal the special provisions regarding the place of residence and living expenses of Members of Congress.
